snippet: Last year 22.67 million travelers visited Mexico, breaking the record set in 2008. The United States was the source of the largest number of visitors, but the increase was also driven by travelers from other countries.
abstract: Last year 22.67 million travelers visited Mexico, breaking the record set in 2008. The United States was the source of the largest number of visitors, but the increase was also driven by travelers from other countries.

headline.main: Tourism Up, Mexico Aims for Non-U.S. Visitors
